description:
I have seen Diego for the last year at my gym.
He was always one of those guys that caught my eye. He looked like the kind of guy you see and think "Hmm, wonder what he looks like naked?" Ok, maybe not everyone thinks like that.
We must have the same schedule as I saw him often enough. He was always really friendly, and when he would talk to other people, he would bust out his pearly whites with his wide infectious smile.
I've said this before, but I don't ask guys to pose for me. It creeps them out.
But a photographer friend of mine worked with him, and when his pictures showed up in my email, I immediately recognized him.
When he arrived for his solo I mentioned I thought I knew him from the gym. He wasn't creeped out at all, but of course, being a straight guy, had never seen me before. Likely a lot more interested in the female eye candy.
So this was kind of a fun fantasy solo for me. The guy at the gym is suddenly right in front of me rubbin' one off!
And he nails himself right in the face when he busts!
title: Diego - Solo
